Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute near 83rd/Holland
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near 83rd/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near 83rd/Holland.

Northbound buses will operate via 87th, State, 83rd and Vincennes including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, 87th and Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
